confirmation.title: Application confirmation
confirmation.header: Thank you for submitting your application
confirmation.sub-header: We have sent you an verification email
confirmation.instruction: Please click the link in that email to confirm your email address

birth-year.label: What year were you born?
birth-year.helper-text: Please note that to be eligible you must be between 18-30 years of age and of the age of majority in your province or territory of residence.

discovery-channel-id.label: How did you hear about the Civic Participation Pilot?
discovery-channel-id.required: How did you hear about the Civic Participation Pilot is required

email.email-invalid: Email address is not in a valid format
email.label: Email address

has-dedicated-device.label: Do you have access to a dedicated device on which to work?
has-dedicated-device.required: Access to a dedicated device is required

internet-quality-id.label: Do you have access to reliable internet?
internet-quality-id.required: Access to reliable internet is required

is-canadian-citizen.label: Are you a Canadian citizen, permanent resident, or protected person?
is-canadian-citizen.helper-text: A protected person is a person on whom refugee protection is conferred under the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act, and whose claim or application has not subsequently been deemed to be rejected under subsection 108(3), 109(3) or 114(4) or that Act.
is-canadian-citizen.required: Canadian citizen, permanent resident, or protected person is required

is-province-major-certified.label: I certify that I am over the age of majority in my province
is-province-major-certified.link: Find the age of majority in your province
is-province-major-certified.required: You must certify that you are over the age of majority in my province
is-province-major-certified.must-be-true: You must certify that you are over the age of majority in my province

language-id.label: In which official language would you prefer to be contacted?

phone-number.label: Phone number
phone-number.phone-invalid: Phone number is not in a valid format (ex. 506-555-5555)

province-id.label: Which province or territory is your principle residence?

identity-information.title: Step 2
identity-information.information-note-1: Please note that the questions in this section will not affect your eligibility for the program, and will be used only for program analysis and evaluation. Please provide the answer that you feel is most applicable to you. You may choose to select ‘Prefer not to answer’ for any question in this section.
identity-information.information-note-2: Please select the demographic characteristics with which you identify.

education-level-id.label: What is your highest level of formal education completed, or enrolled in currently?
education-level-id.helper-text: Please note that there is no education requirement for this program.

gender-id.label: To which gender identity do you most identify?

indigenous-type-id.label: I am a member of an Indigenous community
indigenous-type-id.required: Member of an Indigenous community is required

is-disabled.label: I am a person living with a disability
is-disabled.required: Person living with a disability is required

is-lgbtq.label: I am a member of the LGBTQ2 community
is-lgbtq.required: Member of the LGBTQ2 community is required

is-minority.label: I am a member of a visible minority community
is-minority.required: Member of a visible minority community is required

is-newcomer.label: I am recent newcomer to Canada, within the last 5 years

is-rural.label: I live in a rural or remote area
is-rural.required: Live in a rural or remote area is required

community-interest.label: If you could make a positive impact on one issue in your community what issue would you want to address and why?

program-interest.label: The Civic Participation Pilot is aiming to ensure inclusivity of youth from diverse identities, demographics, learning styles and abilities and educational backgrounds - is there anything you feel would facilitate your participation in this pilot?

skills-interest.label: Tell us about yourself, describe your strenghts, passions and what motivates you. What skills and knowledge do you hope to gain from this experience?

is-information-consented.label: To the best of my knowledge, all information above is true and accurate, and I consent to sharing my response with Employment and Social Development Canada
is-information-consented.required: You must consent to sharing my response with Employment and Social Development Canada
is-information-consented.must-be-true: You must consent to sharing my response with Employment and Social Development Canada
